Hi,

If a junit test case (or the methods it calls) spawns new threads, 
must all the threads terminate before the next test case is called?  
Similarly, can threads spawned by one test case influence the results 
of successive test cases if they are still active across test case 
boundaries?

thanks in advance!
--andrew
